mdRecord.dcterms:title: James C. Blythe House, interior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Griffin, Walter Burley (American architect and city planner, 1876-1937, active in the United States, Australia, and India) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is the third Rock Glen house designed by Griffin, and the second of three houses commissioned by Blythe, the principal developer of Rock Glen. Its design recalls Griffin’s Tempel House (known as "Solid Rock") in Winnetka, Illinois, before that latter building’s alterations. -- http://www.prairieschooltraveler.com/html/ia/masoncity/griffin/blythe.html [work]
